title: Find Opportunities in Obstacles
itunes:title: Find Opportunities in Obstacles
description:
Episode 154 -  "What benefit can come from this?" That could be the most empowering question you ever ask yourself. We all know tough times will come, but the difference between a mediocre life and a life mastered is what we do with the tough times. In this episode I dive into how to find the opportunity in any obstacle in your way.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
